definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: BYD also makes small gasoline-powered cars and is having no trouble selling them.
sentences.chinese: 比亞迪也製造輕型小排量汽車，銷售相當順利。

sentences.english: Though BYD plans to introduce the E6 in the US later this year.
sentences.chinese: 儘管比亞迪計劃在今年晚些時候將E6引入美國市場。

sentences.english: The E6 uses the "Fe," BYD's lithium-ion ferrous phosphate battery.
sentences.chinese: E6使用的是“鐵電池”，即比亞迪的磷酸鐵鋰電池。

sentences.english: This is the hybrid version of BYD's F3.
sentences.chinese: 這是電油混合版的比亞迪F3。

sentences.english: How about a BYD Technology Center in Detroit?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，要不要在底特律建一個比亞迪技術中心呢？

sentences.english: Chinais auto market will continue its rochestgrowth;
sentences.chinese: 中國汽車市場微弱增加將會賡續，比亞迪。

sentences.english: Two years ago BYD symbolised China’s glorious prospects.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前，比亞迪象徵着中國輝煌的前景。

sentences.english: The company also has high hopes for an upcoming sedan called G6.
sentences.chinese: 比亞迪還對即將推出的轎車G6寄予厚望。

sentences.english: Within a year the price of BYD’s shares had risen ninefold.
sentences.chinese: 一年內，比亞迪公司的股價上升了8倍。

sentences.english: That factory produces cars named Bi Yadi.
sentences.chinese: 那個工廠生產比亞迪汽車。

sentences.english: BYD puts N. American headquarters in LA.
sentences.chinese: 中國比亞迪在洛杉磯建立北美總部。

sentences.english: Of course, BYD's sales of gasoline-powered vehicles have seen a huge downturn recently.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，比亞迪的汽油車銷售今年以來大幅下跌。

sentences.english: BYD's F8 is classic example of imitation.
sentences.chinese: 比亞迪F8可謂是一款模仿的經典範例。

definition: China Petroleum and Chemical Corporation, Sinopec
Hon Hai Precision Industry Company, Taiwan technology company, aka Foxconn
Yuhua District of Shijiazhuang City 石家莊市|石家庄市[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 Shi4], Hebei
Hang Seng index (of Hong Kong stock market)
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
